pr_title: SWTBot Tests  for SVN and Git Versioning Backend

timeline.message:
Adding new test cases for testing - (Task #642)

- Added classes for versioning backend and rights management testing in
SWTBot.


---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Rough classes for UI testing versioning BE - (Task #642)

- Added abstract methods for preparing backend and sharing the project.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Initial Version for git ui test setup - (Task #642)

- Added code to setup the test cases with a bare upstream and local
repository in the temp folder area.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Improved Launchers to share workspace - (Task #642)

- Sharing workspace between swt bot test execution and swt bot test
recording. simplifies way of working with recording test cases. Now
possible to start recording where test cases stopped.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Added git backend tear down for swt bot test - (Task #642)

- Removing both the local and remote repo using the VIrtual Satellite
UI.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Initial version for svn ui test setup - (Task #642)

Add setup and share project functionality

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Merge branch 'feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN' of
https://github.com/virtualsatellite/VirtualSatellite4-Core.git into
feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN

Conflicts:
	de.dlr.sc.virsat.swtbot.test/src/de/dlr/sc/virsat/swtbot/test/versioningbackend/SvnVersioningBackendAndUserRightsManagementTest.java

Added and refactored project share in UI test - (Task #642)

- Added a few egneral emthods to improve sharing projects.
- Adjusted existing code in SVN test cases
- Added code for sharing git project.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Add teardown to svn ui test - (Task #642)

- Add a teardown method
- Add method getTreeNodeContaining to ASwtBotTestCase

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Fixing order of git repo cleanup - (Task #642)

- removing the upstream repo first
- then removing the local one

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Merge branch 'feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN' of
https://github.com/virtualsatellite/VirtualSatellite4-Core.git into

Merge branch 'feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN' of https://github.com/virtualsatellite/VirtualSatellite4-Core.git into feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN

Additional Fixes waiting for SVN - (Task #642)

- Added code to wait for svn repo sharing.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Fix svn teardown in ui tests - (Task #642)

Also minor refactoring

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Implementing Commit Project - (Task #642)

- Cannot find correct history view.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Added method for getting commit mesage - (Task #642)

- Implemented method to get commit message for git repositories.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Implemented Git Commit Test Case - (Task #642)

- Git Commit Test Case now checking local and upstream repository for
correct commit message.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Add SVN testCommitProjectAssert - (Task #642)

---

Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Fixed SVN wait for commit - (Task #642)

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Starting update implementation for Git - (Task #642)

- Added code to test the update functionality for Git in Virtual
Satellite on UI level

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Added core implementation for SWT Git Update - (Task #642)

- Added initial implementation.
- Still need to improve synchronization with UI.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend
Merge branch 'feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN' of https://github.com/virtualsatellite/VirtualSatellite4-Core.git into feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN

Added further interlock on JobLevel - (Task #642)

- Added an interlock Job to the wait method for SWTBot.
- This ensures that all Jobs that were sheduled before have beene
xecuted.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Implemented SVN update testcase - (Task #642)

Also minor change in the abstract backend test to wait for a ui update.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Update SVN update test case - (Task #642)

Now uses the SVN connector operations.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend
Merge branch 'feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN' of https://github.com/virtualsatellite/VirtualSatellite4-Core.git into feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN

Add testUpdateProjectChangeAndCommitRemote - (Task #642)

Changed testUpdateProjectChangeAndCommitRemote so it can be reused for
this test case.
Also wait for the git clone in the git backend.

Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Reactivate all SWT tests and refactoring - (Task #642)

---

Task #649: SWTBot Adding test cases for RoleManagement without
Versioning Backend

Write a Heading here - (Task #649)

Put your Message here.

---
Task #649: SWTBot Adding test cases for RoleManagement without
Versioning Backend

Adjusted working directory for tycho maven - (Task #642)

- Adjusted working directory and osgi directory for maven tycho to not
be a subdirectory of the source code. Most times the source code is in a
VCS which conflicts with the VCS testcases of Virtual Satellite
otherwise.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Triggering refresh from commit and update handler - (Task #642)

- Added code to trigger a workspace refresh to make sure the workspace
is correctly up to date.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Improved SWTBot test cases for git and svn - (Task #642)

- Added further debugging methods to ASVTBot test case, i.e. stopHere
which makes the current SWTBotTest exactly at that line of code.
- Added an assert which allows for retries on a condition.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

VTK Link fixes for linux - (Task #642)

- DIggesting errors in a better way for the case of Linking exceptions
to libraries on linux.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Improved Label and ContentProvider for Navigator - (Task #642)

- Improved logging for changes on workspace which need to be processed
by the navigator.
- Improved Transaction Locking on Labelprovider

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Fixed thread access exception in editing domain - (Task #642)

- Fixed invalid thread access in Transactional Editing domain when
processing resources in history listener.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Improved navigator debugging and tree expanding - (Task #642)

- Navigator not relying on sorter state anymore
- Navigator now restoring expand state by identifying the objects from
the currently loaded ED using the URIs from previously loaded Objects.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Cleaned up code for recovering expanded state - (Task #642)

- Added convinience methods to VirSatProjectCommons and
EditingDomainRegistry to easily access Projects and EditingDomains by
their URI.
- Added test cases for the new methods.

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Fixing refresh and redraw in Navigator - (Task #642)

- Encapsulated redraw and refresh into catch block to make sure redraw
is re-enabled even in case of failure.
- Fixed some white spaces and tabulators

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/development' into
feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN

Conflicts:
	de.dlr.sc.virsat.swtbot.test/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
	de.dlr.sc.virsat.swtbot.test/src/de/dlr/sc/virsat/swtbot/test/ProjectUiAllTests.java

Fixing SPotBugs Issue - (Task #642)

- Suppress Warning in stopHere method

---
Task #642: SwtBot tests for SVN/Git backend
Merge branch 'development' into feature/task_642-SwtBot_tests_for_SVN

Fixed import warning - (Task #642)

timeline.bodyText: Should we rename these classes and the abstract class, because we added a seperate class for RoleManagementTest in #649 ? E.g. just GitVersioningBackendTest
